•Poseidon
MARINE SUPPLIES • WORLDWIDE FRS
Dräger
PLIES
TOTAL
CARE
Certificate of Attendance
Awarded to
Mr. FILIPPAKIS PAVLOS-ANGELOS
For successfully completing the course
"INDUCTION TRAINING SEMINAR ON BASIC MAINTENANCE & PROPER USAGE OF
DRÄGER X-AM 5600 / 7000 / 8000, BASED ON TOTAL CARE PROCEDURES."
The training course was held on March 2022 at Poseidon Marine Supplies Training Center
and included:
• Overview of «CC Vision Basic» calibration software for annual calibration / certification
Manual calibration procedure for X-am 5600 / 7000 / 8000
• Function (Bump) test procedure
• Fresh air calibration
• Identification of error messages and handling of alarms
• Intended use and technical specifications
The training course had theoretical and practical instructions. The participant was given the
pportunity to learn the specific knowledge and handling, which are necessary to fulfill the
naintenance at the above mentioned devices according to Total Care procedures, on his owr
responsibility.
The training for Total Care program is
approved by Dräger and performed
by authorized trainers of Poseidon
Marine Supplies.
Total Care program is certified by:
TOV HELLAS
Member of TÜV NORD Group
Authorized trainer:
Markos Viachos
This certificate is valid only as long as the participant is employed at Gaslog and until the end
of Total Care Contract.

This is to certify that Mr. FILIPPAKIS PAVLOS ANGELOS, born on 17/1/1994, in Cholargos, Greece, has successfully completed from
7/9/2020 to 15/9/2020 a training course in BRM and met the requirerents laid down in Regulation I//1 and Regulation VIII/2, of the
International Convention on Standards of Training, Certification and Watchkeeping for Seafarers. (STCW) 1978, as amended and the
standards of competence specified in the sections A-Vili and A-ll and in the tables of Section A-ll/1 The aim of this course is the
acquisition of the knowledge in the effective management and utilitation of all resources. human and technical, available to the Bridge Team to
ensure the safe completion of the vessels voyage. The course in conducted in theoretical Class along with the use of full mission bridge
simulator.
